item.title: 安瓦尔称文莱苏丹因疲劳在马来西亚住院治疗
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）在一次地区峰会闭幕式上告诉记者，文莱苏丹哈桑纳尔-博尔基亚（Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah）因疲劳过度于周二在吉隆坡住院。【原文：Brunei’s Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah was hospitalized in Kuala Lumpur on Tuesday due to fatigue, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim told reporters during the closing of a regional summit.】

item.title: 什么是勒索软件，它是如何发展壮大的？
item.description: 2021 年，在一次导致美国东海岸燃料供应瘫痪的网络攻击之后，时任总统乔-拜登发誓要将勒索软件作为国家安全的优先事项。为遏制勒索软件犯罪，美国通过了行政命令，召开了峰会，并发布了起诉书和制裁措施。四年后的今天，勒索软件仍然是全球企业和组织的眼中钉、肉中刺。零售商、制造商、医院和学校都是 2025 年迄今为止受到影响的对象。勒索软件【原文：In 2021, following a cyberattack that crippled fuel supplies along the US East Coast, then President Joe Biden vowed to make ransomware a national security priority. Executive orders were passed, summits were convened and indictments and sanctions were issued to try to curb the crimes. Four years later, ransomware remains a persistent thorn for businesses and organizations across the world. Retailers, manufacturers, hospitals and schools are among those impacted so far in 2025. item.title: 新加坡推动人工智能发展，开辟本地化模式之路
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，萨里塔-拉伊（Saritha Rai）从新加坡归来，为您带来该地区人工智能的最新进展。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Saritha Rai returns from a week in Singapore with word of the latest AI developments in the region.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在政策转向三年后接近 2% 的通胀目标
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注欧元区通胀前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at prospects for euro-zone inflation. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国为达成贸易协议展开六周冲刺
item.description: 在未来六周内，华盛顿和布鲁塞尔之间将举行一系列高风险会谈，此前双方已商定一个积极的时间表，以达成协议，避免跨大西洋贸易战。【原文：Over the next six weeks, a series of high-stakes talks are set to take place between Washington and Brussels after both sides agreed to an aggressive timeline to reach a deal that averts a transatlantic trade war.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告英国控制预算，否则将面临市场反弹风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）警告说，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）必须坚持其财政规则，控制支出，否则将面临市场反弹的风险，从而破坏政府的经济计划。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves must stick to her fiscal rules and keep spending under control or risk a market backlash that undermines the government’s economic plans, the International Monetary Fund warned.】

item.title: 硅数据公司首创人工智能芯片指数
item.description: 硅数据公司（Silicon Data）是一家专注于图形处理单元成本的市场情报公司，该公司创建了首个每日指数，用于跟踪对人工智能至关重要的专用芯片。【原文：Silicon Data, a market-intelligence firm that focuses on the cost of graphics processing units, created what it says is the first daily index to track the specialized chips vital to powering artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁逼近，苹果股价面临更多痛苦
item.description: 苹果公司股价创下三年多来最长跌势，白宫不断升级的攻击有可能进一步削弱该公司的利润前景，这表明该股今年的挣扎远未结束。【原文：Apple Inc. shares are coming off their longest selloff in more than three years, as escalating attacks from the White House threaten to further erode the company’s profit outlook, suggesting the stock’s struggles this year are far from over.】

item.title: 美国贸易战影响销售，PDD 收入不及预期
item.description: 由于北京和华盛顿之间的贸易紧张局势影响了国内和美国的销售，PDD 控股公司的收入增长令人失望。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s revenue growth disappointed as trade tensions between Beijing and Washington took a toll on both domestic and US sales.】

item.title: 拉马福萨为南非大兴土木，吸引 130 亿美元资金
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，他将南非变为建筑工地并改善其经济表现的计划吸引了超过 2,380 亿兰特（133 亿美元）的投资，创下了历史新高。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa said his plan to turn the nation into a construction site and improve its economic performance has attracted a record of more than 238 billion rand ($13.3 billion) of investment.】

item.title: 摩根大通因法国电力市场调查被罚 50 万欧元
item.description: 摩根大通公司的德国分部被罚款 50 万欧元（56.75 万美元），原因是未能对法国监管机构开展的有关能源危机期间价格飙升的电力市场调查做出充分回应。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s German unit was fined €500,000 ($567,500) for failing to adequately respond to a power market survey carried out by France’s regulator related to soaring prices during the energy crisis.】

item.title: 监察机构称诺和诺德销售困境预示丹麦出口放缓
item.description: 丹麦财政监督机构预测，丹麦的出口增长将明显低于此前的预期，部分原因是诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在美国遭遇挫折。【原文：Denmark’s exports will grow clearly less than expected earlier, partly due to the setbacks Novo Nordisk A/S is facing in the US, the state’s fiscal watchdog forecast.】

item.title: 俄罗斯首富入股科技巨头 Yandex
item.description: 亿万富翁弗拉基米尔-波塔宁（Vladimir Potanin）收购了俄罗斯领先科技公司 Yandex 的股份，在此之前，该公司在荷兰注册的创始人去年出售了公司的本地业务。【原文：Billionaire Vladimir Potanin acquired a stake in Yandex, Russia’s leading tech company, following the expiration of a lock-up period related to last year’s sale of the company’s local business by its Dutch-registered founder.】

item.title: 据说 HDFC 部门即将获得 SEBI 批准，在印度首次公开募股 15 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，印度建屋发展局金融服务有限公司（HDB Financial Services Ltd.）即将获得印度证券监管机构对其首次公开募股的批准，这将使这家影子贷款机构成为印度今年最大的上市机构之一。【原文：HDB Financial Services Ltd. is close to securing the go-ahead from India’s securities regulator for its initial public offering, according to people familiar with the plan, which would allow the shadow lender to launch one of the country’s biggest listings this year.】

item.title: 腾讯在进军中国 K-Pop 音乐市场前增加韩国音乐曝光率
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司正在抢购 SM Entertainment Co.Ltd价值约1.8亿美元的股份，这是近年来中国对韩国公司的罕见投资。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is snapping up a nearly 10% stake in SM Entertainment Co. Ltd valued at about $180 million, marking a rare Chinese investment into a South Korean company in recent years.】

item.title: 上市在即，印度顶级交易所估值飙升 60
item.description: 据参与近期交易的人士称，全球最大的股票衍生品交易所上市的希望越来越大，这使得印度国家证券交易所有限公司在私募市场上的估值达到 580 亿美元。【原文：Growing hopes for a listing of the world’s biggest equity-derivatives bourse have pushed the valuation of the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. to $58 billion in private markets, according to people involved in recent transactions.】

item.title: 小米第一季度销售额超预期，得益于电动汽车和手机的增长
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）公布的三季度营收好于预期，该公司正积极拓展在中国电动车市场的业务，并发展其核心智能手机业务。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. reported better-than-expected revenue in the March quarter as it moves to aggressively expand its presence in China’s EV market and grow its core smartphone business.】

item.title: 美国企业继续推进资本扩张计划为股市带来动力
item.description: 华尔街担心贸易战的焦虑会使企业在机械和房地产方面的支出停滞不前，但到目前为止，这种担心似乎有些言过其实。【原文：Wall Street’s fear that trade-war anxiety would grind corporations’ spending on machinery and real estate to a halt, so far, is looking a little overblown.】

item.title: 沙特阿美启动今年首次美元债券销售
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司开始出售美元债务，扩大了公司的借贷范围，因为该公司希望利用其资产负债表。【原文：Saudi Aramco started the sale of dollar-denominated debt, extending the company’s borrowings as it looks to leverage its balance sheet.】

item.title: 中国就 "零里程 "二手车问题传唤顶级汽车制造商
item.description: 中国商务部正在与中国最大的几家汽车制造商会面，讨论该行业是否在利用漏洞掩盖销售疲软。【原文：China’s Ministry of Commerce is meeting with some of the country’s biggest automakers to discuss whether the industry is using a loophole to mask weakening sales.】

item.title: 默茨称基辅盟国数月前就已终止对俄罗斯罢工的限制
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）说，乌克兰的盟国几个月前决定放弃对使用他们提供的武器的限制，允许基辅打击俄罗斯纵深地区的目标。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said Ukraine’s allies decided several months ago to drop restrictions on the use of the weapons they’ve provided to allow Kyiv to strike targets deep inside Russia.】

item.title: 经典投资策略再次面临压力
item.description:
60/40股票和债券投资组合最近陷入困境

The 60/40 stock and bond portfolio has struggled lately

item.title: 泰尔基金牵头向保加利亚太空公司投资 4900 万美元
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的创始人基金（Founders Fund）将对保加利亚卫星制造商 EnduroSat 公司投资 4300 万欧元（4900 万美元），以增加其太空投资组合。【原文：Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund is adding to its space portfolio by leading a €43 million ($49 million) investment in EnduroSat, a Bulgarian manufacturer of satellites.】

item.title: 泰国通过退出美国知识产权观察名单计划
item.description: 泰国内阁批准了一项新的知识产权执法框架，因为这个东南亚国家希望在与华盛顿进行关税谈判之前退出美国的观察名单。【原文：Thailand’s cabinet approved a new framework for enforcement of intellectual property rights as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to exit from a US watchlist ahead of tariff talks with Washington.】

item.title: 手握 7 万亿美元现金的投资者翘首以待英伟达财报
item.description: 据 BBVA 的策略师称，Nvidia 公司乐观的财报将是美国股市反弹的好兆头，因为投资者有大约 7 万亿美元的现金基金。【原文：An upbeat earnings report by Nvidia Corp. would bode well for a rally in US equities as investors have about $7 trillion parked in cash funds, according to BBVA strategists.】

item.title: 土耳其金融科技公司 Papara 在非法赌博调查中被查封
item.description: 据国营阿纳多卢通讯社报道，土耳其当局查封了电子支付公司 Papara Elektronik Para AS，指控该公司为非法赌博提供便利。【原文：Turkish authorities seized electronic payments firm Papara Elektronik Para AS on charges that the company facilitated illegal gambling, state-run Anadolu Agency reported.】

item.title: 卡什卡利赞成在关税进一步明朗之前维持美联储利率不变
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）在贸易战带来的不确定性和捍卫通胀预期的 "最重要 "需求面前，加倍强调要保持谨慎。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari doubled down on his case for caution amid uncertainty caused by the trade war and the “paramount” need to defend inflation expectations.】

item.title: 中东自关税动荡以来的首次公开募股首秀波澜不惊
item.description: 沙特包装制造商联合纸箱工业公司（United Carton Industries Co.【原文：Saudi packaging manufacturer United Carton Industries Co.’s stock climbed amid a mixed debut in Riyadh, a sign that broader market turbulence may be impacting Middle Eastern listings.】

item.title: 欧洲电力公司匆忙应对风电干旱问题
item.description: 过去十年间，欧洲斥资约 3800 亿美元将风力发电能力提高了近一倍，现在，公用事业公司正转向一个鲜为人知的不起眼市场，以保护自己免受长期风平浪静天气的影响。【原文：After spending about $380 billion over the past decade to nearly double wind power capacity in Europe, utilities are now turning to an obscure and little-known market to protect themselves against a prolonged bout of calm weather.】

item.title: 欧盟制裁液化天然气油轮，三井OSK寻求日本帮助
item.description: 在欧盟出人意料地决定制裁三井OSK轮船公司三艘与俄罗斯项目有关的液化天然气油轮之后，三井OSK轮船公司正在向日本政府寻求帮助。【原文：Mitsui OSK Lines Ltd. is seeking help from the Japanese government after a surprise decision by the European Union to sanction three of its liquefied natural gas tankers linked to a Russian project.】
